>> 
>> A = [5 6 2 7; 4 9 5 5; 2 3 2 6; 2 4 3 6]
A =

   5   6   2   7
   4   9   5   5
   2   3   2   6
   2   4   3   6

>> B = [3; 2; 0; 2]
B =

   3
   2
   0
   2

>> Y = [1; 1; 3; 3]
Y =

   1
   1
   3
   3

>> X1 = (A^2) \ B
X1 =

  -64.48760330576775
   57.96694214874481
  -74.69421487601315
   19.65289256197820

>> X2 = (A^5 * A') \ B
X2 =

   6.074995631416078e+04
  -6.295069217123320e+04
  -2.661572406947050e+05
   2.470603850124090e+05

>> z = Y' * A^2 * A' * A^3 * Y
z = 532686097
>> A1 = (A - A^2) ^2
A1 =

   18880   34398   19579   34937
   21900   39899   22706   40511
   11370   20719   11802   21071
   13212   24075   13712   24479

>> A2 = 3 * A^3 - A^2
A2 =

   3458   6287   3568   6370
   4010   7306   4143   7361
   2068   3771   2161   3880
   2404   4386   2511   4499

>> A3 = (A^4 - A^2) ^2
A3 =

   2239119978   4079713414   2322555662   4144907942
   2596944756   4731675848   2693713358   4807287324
   1349222364   2458305752   1399499336   2497593126
   1567666800   2856315098   1626083578   2901962662

>> diary off
